title: A Very Interesting Short Film
description:
The self-esteem of a young man is crushed when his music is rejected by an influential record label. His choice to confront their decision leads into a downward spiral of physical and emotional events that reinvigorates a new creativity within his production. 

The self-awareness and maturity that emerges from this helps strengthen relationships within the film and symbolises the introspective journey undertaken by an individual. 

It is a story of a man alone, fighting his internal demons and external limitations. It deals with the common misconceptions surrounding the nature of mental illness and their impact on the life of a sufferer.

Please enjoy.

www.filmic.co.nz
